experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Loanwoan.com is a multilingual platform, online marketplace for SME funding. We are creating an end-to-end digital platform for MSME to apply for debt funding. A single login will enable MSME to apply to multiple lender, no multiple credit bureau check and managing multiple agents. Just register, upload documents and get matched to a lender universe. This would reduce the time required to borrow for MSME.
experience.description_html: Loanwoan.com is a multilingual platform, online marketplace for SME funding. We are creating an end-to-end digital platform for MSME to apply for debt funding. experience.title: Registered Valuer
experience.description: Registered as Registered Valuer for Securities or Financial Assets with Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (Registration Number - IBBI/RV/06/2019/11937). Section 247 of the Companies Act 2013 (Act) makes it mandatory that where the valuation is required for any stocks, shares, debentures, property, securities and/or goodwill or any other assets or the net worth of a company and/or its liabilities by and under the provisions of the Act, the valuation shall be done by a registered valuer.  The registered valuer has to be appointed by an audit committee and in its absence the Board of directors.
experience.description_html: Registered as Registered Valuer for Securities or Financial Assets with Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (Registration Number - IBBI/RV/06/2019/11937). The registered valuer has to be appointed by an audit committee and in its absence the Board of directors.

experience.title: Founder Director
experience.description: GAIN is an angel investor network focused on promoting start-up/early stage companies in Teir II, Tier III cities and rural areas.Our vision is to "Change The Game of Angel Investing" in India by focusing on businesses with high ROE and potential to generate free cash flows.

experience.title: Director
experience.description: Grocap is a boutique investment advisory firm founded with a mission to bridge the financing gap by providing flexible and innovative financial products moving away from traditional financing solutions.We work closely with promoters/top management teams and assist them in making informed decisions while accessing capital by sharing the knowledge rather than just providing the deliverable.
